abilities.name: Obsessive Annunciation
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[SUSTAINED HITS 1]** ability.

abilities.name: Doom Siren
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this model’s unit has shot, select one enemy **INFANTRY** unit hit by one or more of those attacks and roll three D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If an enemy unit suffers one or more mortal wounds as a result of this ability, it must take a Battle-shock test.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s power sword can be replaced with 1 screamer pistol and 1 close combat weapon.
unit_composition:
